sentence.Network_en: Schools tend to perpetuate the myth that boys are better at sport than girls.
sentence.Network_cn: 学校往往会助长男孩比女孩体育强这一错误观念的延续.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from Latin perpetuat- 'made permanent', from the verb perpetuare, from perpetuus 'continuing throughout' (see perpetual)

entry.tran: 使（尤指不好的情况、制度、信仰等）继续，延长
entry.def: If someone or something perpetuates a situation, system, or belief, especially a bad one, they cause it to continue.

example.ex: We must not perpetuate the religious divisions of the past...
example.tran: 我们绝对不能让过去的宗教分裂继续下去。

example.ex: This image is a myth perpetuated by the media.
example.tran: 这种形象是媒体宣传造成的错觉。

auth_sentence.content: Micheal seems to perpetuate the confusion between Pyrrhonism and Skepticism.
auth_sentence.res_content: Micheal seems to perpetuate the confusion between Pyrrhonism and Skepticism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Micheal seems to perpetuate the confusion between Pyrrhonism and Skepticism.

auth_sentence.content: It suited a lot of people to perpetuate that myth.

auth_sentence.content: We're not here just to self-perpetuate our service in Congress.

stems_affixes.word_buile: centri=centr中心+pet追+al……的→追求中心的→向心的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有能力的,能胜任的;足够的
竞争的;好竞争的;[价格等的]有竞争力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compete[v.比赛,竞争]+itive……的→adj.竞争的;好竞争的;[价格等的]有竞争力的
per全部永久+pet追求,寻求+ual……的→追求永久的
pet追求,寻求+ulant多……的→追求太多,导致脾气不好
pro前+piti=pet追求,寻求+ous……的→在[别人]前面追到→幸运的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 食欲,胃口;欲望,性欲;爱好,趣味
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap一再+pet追求,寻求+ite表名词→一再追求→有胃口
appet=appetite胃口+izer东西→n.开胃食品,开胃物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能力,胜任某种工作的资格
stems_affixes.word_buile: competent[[adj.有能力的,能胜任的;足够的]]省鷑.能力,胜任某种工作的资格
compete[v.比赛,竞争]+ition表名词→n.竞争, 竞赛
pet追求,寻求+ition表名词→追寻状态→请愿[词性变化:可做动词]
petition[n.请愿书,申请书 v.[向…]请愿,正式请求]+er人→n.请愿人
per全部,永久+pet追求,寻求+uate=ate表动词→追求永久
pet追求,寻求+ition表名词→追寻状态→请愿[词性变化:可做动词]
pro前+piti=pet追求,寻求+ate表动词→追到前面去→获宠爱

Sentence.sentence: Regardless, all these complex measures had the same psychological purpose: to reassure people that the free fall would stop and, thereby, curb the fear that would perpetuate (使持久) a free fall.

means.word_mean: 使永存;使人记住不忘;使不朽

sentences.en: Schools tend to perpetuate the myth that boys are better at sport than girls.
sentences.cn: 学校往往会助长男孩比女孩体育强这一错误观念的延续。

sentences.en: Giving these events a lot of media coverage merely perpetuates the problem.
sentences.cn: 媒体大量地报道这些事件只会使问题持续下去。
笑话固化了对各民族的公式化看法。
